item.title: What the man says while cleansing himself
item.summary: The man who is cleansing himself (after shooting and killing another man) takes |kui fruit in his hands and speaks, saying that his heart must be calm and does not burn. The father-in-law says words that are intended for the relations of the man who has been killed.
item.comments: 1) See also Purification after shooting a person and The manner in which a man who is being cleansed, is prepared for drinking water and Further particulars regarding the purification or cleansing (|koa), 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-11
item.author: !nanni (XI)
